name: topup
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: topup is part of FSL and is used to estimate and correct for susceptibility-induced distortions in echo planar imaging (EPI) data.

inputs.description: Name of 4D file with images
inputs.name: Input main file

inputs.description: Name of text file with PE directions/times
inputs.name: Data file

inputs.description: Base-name of output files (spline coefficients (Hz) and movement parameters)
inputs.name: Output basename

inputs.description: Name of image file with field (Hz)
inputs.name: Field output file

inputs.description: Name of 4D image file with unwarped images
inputs.name: Unwarped images file

inputs.description: Name of log-file
inputs.name: Log file

inputs.description: (Approximate) resolution (in mm) of warp basis for the different sub-sampling levels, default 10
inputs.name: Warp resolution

inputs.description: Sub-sampling scheme, default 1
inputs.name: Sub-sampling scheme

inputs.description: FWHM (in mm) of gaussian smoothing kernel, default 8
inputs.name: Gaussian smoothing kernel

inputs.description: Name of config file specifying command line arguments
inputs.name: Config file

inputs.description: Max # of non-linear iterations, default 5
inputs.name: Max non-linear iterations

inputs.description: Weight of regularisation, default depending on --ssqlambda and --regmod switches. See user documentation.
inputs.name: Regularisation weight

inputs.description: If set (=1), lambda is weighted by current ssq, default 1
inputs.name: Weighted lambda flag

inputs.description: Model for regularisation of warp-field [membrane_energy bending_energy], default bending_energy
inputs.name: Regularisation model

inputs.description: Estimate movements if set, default 1 (true)
inputs.name: Estimate movements

inputs.description: Minimisation method 0=Levenberg-Marquardt, 1=Scaled Conjugate Gradient, default 0 (LM)
inputs.name: Minimisation method

inputs.description: Order of spline, 2=Quadratic spline, 3=Cubic spline. Default=3
inputs.name: Spline order

inputs.description: Precision for representing Hessian, double or float. Default double
inputs.name: Numerical precision

inputs.description: Image interpolation model, linear or spline. Default spline
inputs.name: Interpolation model

inputs.description: If set (=1), the images are individually scaled to a common mean, default 0 (false)
inputs.name: Scale images

inputs.description: If set (=1), the calculations are done in a different grid, default 1 (true)
inputs.name: Regrid calculations

inputs.description: Number of threads to use (cannot be greater than numbers of hardware cores), default 1
inputs.name: Number of threads

inputs.description: Print diagnostic information while running
inputs.name: Verbose flag
